entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -37.8°C
